metadata.title: USN-3661-1 -- Batik vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Batik incorrectly handled certain XML. An attacker could possibly use this to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3661-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libbatik-java - 1.7.ubuntu-8ubuntu2.14.04.3 No subscription required
